.@CoryBooker Condemns Trump Administration Decision to Expand Drilling in Atlantic: https://www.booker.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=721&utm_content=bufferaf356&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer

In 1969, California experienced one of the worst oil spills in U.S. history. The spill in Santa Barbara had a devastating impact on the marine life and the environment. We can’t let that happen again by opening up our coastal waters to oil and gas companies for drilling.

RT @FoxNews .@POTUS backs Sen. @RandPaul's plan to fund infrastructure projects with suspended aid to Pakistan http://www.foxnews.com/us/2018/01/06/trump-backs-sen-pauls-plan-to-fund-infrastructure-projects-with-suspended-aid-to-pakistan.html

RT @realDonaldTrump Good idea Rand! https://twitter.com/randpaul/status/949001475174354945 QT @RandPaul I’m introducing a bill to end aid to Pakistan in the coming days. I'm not sure why President Trump wants to shut down the government over an $18 billion wall that no one wants, isn't needed and Mexico won't pay for. What the American people want, overwhelmingly, is to provide legal protection and a path toward citizenship for 800,000 Dreamers.

I looked out for our state’s fishermen by pushing federal agencies to allow for an expanded recreational red snapper season. This extension benefits Floridians and offers overdue, much-needed data on red snapper populations for future management planning in the South Atlantic. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DS4T67JVMAA2rDi.jpg

RT @jorge_aguilarDC As someone who’s lived on the southern border, I can tell you one thing: Trump’s “big, beautiful” wall is a big, ugly waste of everyone’s time and 💰that would be better spent helping our seniors afford life-saving care or expanding housing for veterans – and so much more.
